verses.verse: Now <WG1161> a certain <WG5100> man was <WG2258> <WG5713> sick <WG770> <WG5723>, named El'azar <WG2976>, of <WG575> Beit-Anyah <WG963>, <WG1537> the town <WG2968> of Miryam <WG3137> and <WG2532> her <WG846> sister <WG79> Marta <WG3136>.

Therefore <WG3767> his sisters <WG79> sent <WG649> <WG5656> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, behold <WG2396>, he whom <WG3739> thou lovest <WG5368> <WG5719> is sick <WG770> <WG5719>.

When <WG5613> he had heard <WG191> <WG5656> therefore <WG3767> that <WG3754> he was sick <WG770> <WG5719>, he abode <WG3306> <WG5656> two <WG1417> days <WG2250> still <WG5119> <WG3303> in <WG1722> the same place <WG5117> where <WG3739> he was <WG2258> <WG5713>.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5662>, Are there <WG1526> <WG5748> not <WG3780> twelve <WG1427> hours <WG5610> in the day <WG2250>? If <WG1437> any man <WG5100> walk <WG4043> <WG5725> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250>, he stumbleth <WG4350> <WG5719> not <WG3756>, because <WG3754> he seeth <WG991> <WG5719> the light <WG5457> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889>.

But <WG1161> if <WG1437> a man <WG5100> walk <WG4043> <WG5725> in <WG1722> the night <WG3571>, he stumbleth <WG4350> <WG5719>, because <WG3754> there is <WG2076> <WG5748> no <WG3756> light <WG5457> in <WG1722> him <WG846>.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto her <WG846>, Thy <WG4675> brother <WG80> shall rise again <WG450> <WG5698>.
